Package etomica.eam

Class PotentialCalculationEnergySumEAM

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.PotentialCalculationEnergySum
      • etomica.eam.PotentialCalculationEnergySumEAM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PotentialCalculation, PotentialCalculationMolecular

    public class PotentialCalculationEnergySumEAM
extends PotentialCalculationEnergySum
    Evaluate the energy for the EAM model using the P2EAM potential. This potential calculation will explicitly include the embedding contribution from the EAM potential.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
